Name: classoid
Description: the oid of the system catalog this object appears in

Name: description
Description: arbitrary text that serves as the description of this object.

Name: objoid
Description: the oid of the object this description pertains to

Name: objsubid
Description: for a comment on a table attribute, this is the attribute's column number (the objoid and classoid refer to the table itself). for all other object types, this field is presently zero.
